Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Hi! I found packaging of Expat 2.2.0 to 2.3.0 in Spack: https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/c8868f1922c91fb7d8635ed88a06159857a7cae6/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/expat/package.py#L16-L22

All releases of Expat <2.4.0 are [known vulnerable](https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/blob/master/expat/Changes), the latest release upstream is 2.4.1. It would be great to get the Spack user base on safe ground. Thank you! :pray: 


### Error Message

n/a

title: Please upgrade vulnerable Expat to version >=2.4.0 (CVE-2013-0340)
